mapper.update:
update fdfb_user
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
xb = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
departmentid = #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
createon = #{createon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modifyon = #{newMofifyon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modifyby = #{modifyby,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
unit_inner_coding = #{unitInnerCoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_inner_coding = #{unitInnerCoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
emp_no = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and modifyon = #{modifyon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}

update fdfb_user set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, xb = #{xb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, departmentid = #{departmentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, createon = #{createon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modifyon = #{newMofifyon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createby = #{createby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modifyby = #{modifyby,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, unit_inner_coding = #{unitInnerCoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, emp_inner_coding = #{empInnerCoding,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupid = #{groupid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, and modifyon = #{modifyon,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, and emp_no = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from fdfb_user where departmentid = #{1} and seqno in (select userid as seqno from fdfb_user_role a where a.roleid = #{0} )

SELECT org_name,org_inner_coding as porgId,new_org_no as orgcode from aml_org c where c.org_inner_coding in ( select b.p_org_inncoding from aml_org b where b.org_inner_coding=#{org_inner_coding,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.`status`='1' )
select b.org_name as orgName,b.new_org_no orgCode,b.org_inner_coding as orgId from aml_org b where b.p_org_inncoding=#{org_inner_coding,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.`status`='1'
select b.org_name as orgName,b.new_org_no orgCode,b.org_inner_coding as orgId from aml_org b where b.org_inner_coding=#{org_inner_coding,jdbcType=INTEGER} and b.`status`='1'

select o.org_name,o.new_org_no,o.org_inner_coding from fdfb_user user,aml_emp_post e,aml_post_unit p,aml_unit unit,aml_org o where user.emp_inner_coding = e.emp_inner_coding and e.post_inner_coding = p.post_inner_coding and p.unit_inner_coding = unit.unit_inner_coding and unit.org_id = o.org_inner_coding and e.status = '1' and e.main_post = '1' and p.status = '1' and unit.status = '1' and o.status = '1' and user.seqno = #{seqno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
